*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-12-01

#### Contact Information

#### Tender Documents

*   **French Version**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6411/30004476---demande-de-qualification---fr.pdf>

#### Tender Description

The proposed project involves the provision of construction services for the slipway repairs at Black Duck Brook, NL. The scope of work includes the necessary construction activities to complete the project. If you wish to participate, please contact the contracting authority via email to obtain more information.

Please review the [Request for Qualification Document](#tender-attachments) to learn more about this project and how to apply. The closing date for submissions is `2023-06-30`. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns.
